scriptLines: source1, source2 assert(expectTrue(!isNull(COMM), false, 'assertNULL', null, 'Checking NULLS'),
expectExists(source1@DEPTNO == source2@DEPTNO, false, 'assertDEP', null, 'Checking Exists in DEP')) ~> assert1
Address as (State as string, Country as string, PinCode as string),
Contact as ({phone } as string, Email as string)

sources.name: DS_EMP_DEPT
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DS_EMP_DEPT
